content: do you have a single skein of fingering weight yarn in your stash that you d like to use up the dorchester scarf is the perfect project designed with sophistication ease and practicality this scarf uses only 1 skein of fingering weight yarn made with a simple ribbed pattern this scarf is easy to crochet and is the perfect mindless project ad-free pdf https //www etsy com/listing/1592026857/crochet-pattern-1-skein-fingering-weight
